function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Default simulation time step may not be optimal for modeling contagious diseases with different transmission rates and behaviors.","category":"Modeling and simulation risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate validation of simulation accuracy may result in unreliable outcomes and recommendations for safe space design and policy-making.","category":"Modeling and simulation risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of interface for customizing contexts","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Manual assignment of tags to 3d objects","category":"Operational and implementation risks ","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Customization of occupant properties may lead to inaccurate simulation of virus spread.","category":"Modeling and prediction risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The visualization methods may oversimplify the complexity of virus transmission in the built environment, leading to misinterpretation of simulation results.","category":"Modeling and simulation risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate simulation configuration leading to inaccurate results","category":"Modeling and simulation risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Virtual humans with agency behaving realistically within the building model can simulate virus transmission scenarios.","category":"Artificial intelligence and machine learning risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Modeling contagion-related human behaviors within the building can provide insights into virus spread dynamics.","category":"Healthcare and medical risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited flexibility for customizing configurations within the simulation tool","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Focus on small spaces with simple geometry in existing virus transmission simulations","category":"Healthcare infrastructure and technology adoption risks ","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Incomplete integration of agency into virtual humans to incorporate dynamics of human behaviour within the building.","category":"Artificial intelligence and machine learning risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglecting to incorporate contextual information in the building model for human behaviour simulation.","category":"Healthcare infrastructure and technology adoption risks ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Relying solely on macro-level mobility aspects in the simulation without considering micro-level interactions within environments.","category":"Modeling and simulation risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Stochastic modelling paradigms for simulating occupant behavior","category":"Modeling and prediction risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incorporating agency into virtual humans to evaluate design with multi-occupant scenarios","category":"Artificial intelligence and machine learning risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Manual identification of noise sources from social media data limits the scalability and accuracy of the analysis.","category":"Data privacy and security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of integrated data infrastructure leading to difficulty in data collection and sharing","category":"Infrastructure and connectivity risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Information gap and digital divide hindering access to reliable information about disease outbreaks.","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Underestimation of park visitation due to repeated data from the same user","category":"Modeling and prediction risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of cell phone location data for research purposes","category":"Data privacy and security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Association between information overload and sharing unverified information on social media","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Positive influences of online information trust, information overload, perceived severity, and perceived susceptibility on cyberchondria","category":"Healthcare and medical risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Socio-technical lock-ins leading to limited flexibility in transitioning to sustainable energy practices.","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Complex sociotechnical processes of decarbonisation within energy systems","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited ability to collect geolocation data for studying disease transmission in the built environment.","category":"Data privacy and security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to analyze changes in behavior due to single moment measurement","category":"Healthcare and medical risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data analysis on compliance measures","category":"Data privacy and security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of beta-diversity metric choice on research results","category":"Modeling and prediction risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sequencing bacterial communities","category":"Healthcare and medical risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prediction of user behaviors and panic-related searches on google trends.","category":"Modeling and prediction risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of innovative technologies like drones and sensors may lead to over-reliance on technology and reduced human oversight, increasing the risk of missing safety hazards.","category":"Operational and risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift towards digital life and remote work","category":"Healthcare infrastructure and technology adoption risks ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"School and ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited attention to article level metrics alms and their impact on scientific community.","category":"Healthcare infrastructure and technology adoption risks ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate utilization of online comments, social media discussions, and recommendations as alms.","category":"Healthcare infrastructure and technology adoption risks ","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Temporal dynamics of topics","category":"Modeling and prediction risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Network information between linked documents","category":"Data
